body_html:
Relevant line from Exception (it's sort of hidden in the middle):

Caused by: java.lang.RuntimeException: Native TF methods not found; check that the correct native libraries are present and loaded.

The most likely cause is that you're only packaging armeabi-v7a libs for an x86 emulated device. Bazel builds multiple ABIs, but the gradle.build only specifies armeabi-v7a, so you should change that to x86 or x86_64.

Relevant line from Exception (it's sort of hidden in the middle):

Caused by: java.lang.RuntimeException: Native TF methods not found; check that the correct native libraries are present and loaded.

The most likely cause is that you're only packaging armeabi-v7a libs for an x86 emulated device. Bazel builds multiple ABIs, but the gradle.build only specifies armeabi-v7a, so you should change that to x86 or x86_64.
body:
Relevant line from Exception (it's sort of hidden in the middle):

> Caused by: java.lang.RuntimeException: Native TF methods not found; check that the correct native libraries are present and loaded.

The most likely cause is that you're only packaging armeabi-v7a libs for an x86 emulated device. Bazel builds multiple ABIs, but the gradle.build only specifies armeabi-v7a, so you should change that to x86 or x86_64.
